meanings.sent1: After his successful term, he was considered reeligible for the next election.
meanings.sent2: The reeligible candidate was well-known in the community for his previous work.
meanings.sent3: The reeligible mayor joked that he would run for office until he turned 100!
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to public service made her a reeligible choice for the upcoming election.
meanings.sent5: The concept of being reeligible for office excited many citizens.

meanings.sent1: The reeligible council member had the support of many constituents.
meanings.sent2: Being reeligible for another term, she started planning her campaign early.
meanings.sent3: The reeligible senator playfully teased his opponents about their chances in the next election.
meanings.sent4: Her track record in office made her a reeligible candidate in the eyes of the voters.
meanings.sent5: The idea of being reeligible brought both excitement and nerves to the incumbent.
